#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

double P [2600][2600];

int main ()
{
	int N, M, l;
	double E [2600];
	//long double** P = new long double* [2600];
	//long double P [2600][2600];
	for (int i = 0; i < 2600; i++)
	{
		E [i] = -1.0;
		//P [i] = new long double [2600];
		for (int j = 0; j < 2600; j++)
		{
			P [i][j] = -1.0;
		}
	}
	E [2] = 1.0000;
	//while (scanf ("%d %d", &N, &M) != 0)
	 while(cin >> N >> M)
	{
		N = N*M;
		for (int i = 1; i <= N-2; i++)
		{
			if (P [i][i] == -1.0)
			{
				P [i][i] = i;
			}
			l = i % 2;
			if (l == 0)
			{
				P [i][0] = E [i];
				l = 2;
			}
			for (int j = l; j < i-2; j += 2)
			{
				if (P [i][j] == -1.0)
				{
					P [i][j] = 1 + (j*P [i-1][j-1] + ((i-j)*((j+1)*P [i-2][j]+j+(i-j-2)*P[i-2][j+2]))/(i-1))/i;
				}
			}
			if (i > 2)
			{
				P [i][i-2] = 1 + ((i-2)*P [i-1][i-3] + (2*((i-1)*P [i-2][i-2]+i-2))/(i-1))/i;
			}
			if (l % 2 == 0 && E [i+2] == -1.0)
			{
				E [i+2] = 1+(E [i]+i*P[i][2])/(i+1);
			}
		}
		printf ("%.4lf\n", E [N]);
	}
	return 0;
}
